data.title: El Ingenio Teatro
data.meta_description: Cancellation note The organizing Committee of the first International theatre Festival dedicated to women and its President Lilliam Vega, regrets that for visa problems, teachers Eugenio Barba and Julia Varley not be able to be on Saturday with us as planned, Staying in the following way the programming for this weekend: Saturday 25 (Cancelled) Sunday
data.text:
Festival 2017

Cancellation note

The organizing Committee of the first International theatre Festival dedicated to women and its President Lilliam Vega, regrets that for visa problems, teachers Eugenio Barba and Julia Varley not be able to be on Saturday with us as planned, Staying in the following way the programming for this weekend:

Saturday 25 (Cancelled)

Sunday 26

4pm: Projection of the documentary “The country where the trees fly” of Jacopo Quadri and Davide Barletti on the 50 years of Odin Teatret. Words via Skype from Master Eugenio Barba.

Intermediate with cocktail.

5:30pm: Nordisk Teater Laboratorium (Odin teatret). “Memory Seeds”. Direction Julia Varley with Anna Woolf.

6:30pm: Homage to the teachers Flora Lauten and Julia Varley (words via Skype) for the UM and launch of the magazine Apogee by its director Baltasar Martin.

We regret any inconvenience that this decision might have caused you with regard to obtaining tickets. Please speak with our locker 786 261 6774.

See Dossier

Press

The Spectator: See Theater in Miami, another plan for tourists

Theater in Miami: Cassandra International Festival: Video, Monologue, Homage and magazine
